content:
Vega Sport Performance Protein in Berry flavor would mix beautifully with frozen berries and almond milk to create a delicious and refreshing post-workout smoothie!

The Berry flavor of Vega Sport Performance Protein is a fruity and slightly sweet blend that will complement the natural sweetness of the frozen berries. The protein powder's smooth and creamy texture will also help to create a velvety consistency when blended with almond milk.

Here's a simple recipe you can try:

**Berry Bliss Post-Workout Smoothie**

* 1 scoop Vega Sport Performance Protein (Berry flavor)
* 1/2 cup frozen mixed berries (such as blueberries, strawberries, and raspberries)
* 1/2 cup unsweetened almond milk
* 1 tablespoon chia seeds (optional)
* Ice cubes (as needed)

Combine all the ingredients in a blender and blend on high speed until smooth and creamy. You can add ice cubes if you prefer a thicker consistency.

This smoothie will provide approximately 30 grams of protein, 20 grams of carbohydrates, and 10 grams of healthy fats to support your post-workout recovery. The berries will provide a boost of antioxidants, while the chia seeds will add an extra dose of omega-3 fatty acids and fiber.

Enjoy your delicious and nutritious post-workout smoothie, and don't hesitate to experiment with different combinations of fruits and spices to find your favorite flavor!
